dict.acceptation: 古代的，已往的；古老的，过时的；年老的；老式的；
古代人；古文明国的国民；<古>高龄老人；<古>旗手；

sent.orig: Ancient culture sites and ancient tombs are important cultural trace which reflect the ancient mankind lives.
sent.trans: 古文化遗址、古墓葬是反映古人类生活的重要文化遗迹。

sent.orig: The near provenance relation between ancient Jun porcelain and ancient Ru porcelain is preliminarily analyzed.
sent.trans: 初步分析了古钧瓷与古汝瓷相近的起源关系。

sent.orig: Statues and paintings show heroes heroes of ancient ancient Troy and Athens.
sent.trans: 雕像和绘画展示着古代特洛伊人和雅典人。

sent.orig: Is the most ancient city of Handan City, Hebei Province, China's famous ancient Cities.
sent.trans: 邯郸市是河北省最古老的城市，也是我国古代著名的城邑。

sent.orig: It is essential to identify the colour of ancient jade in dividing generation of ancient jade.
sent.trans: 对古玉颜色的鉴别是玉器鉴赏与断代的重要依据。
